name: The Last Face
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

A director of an international aid agency in Africa meet a relief aid doctor amidst a political/social revolution, and together face tough choices surrounding humanitarianism and life through civil unrest.
about_the_game: A director of an international aid agency in Africa meet a relief aid doctor amidst a political/social revolution, and together face tough choices surrounding humanitarianism and life through civil unrest.
short_description: Oscar® winners Charlize Theron and Javier Bardem are international aid workers in Africa fighting for humanity during civil unrest in this moving drama from two-time Academy Award® winner Sean Penn.
